allow: Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" api user --jq '{login: .login, name: .name, email: .email}')
Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" repo list ctadz --limit 5)
Bash("C:/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" release view v0.5.0 --repo ctadz/school-management-plugin --json assets --jq '.assets[0].url')

Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
$source = ''school-management''
$dest = ''school-management-v0.5.0.zip''
if (Test-Path $dest) { Remove-Item $dest -Force }
Compress-Archive -Path $source -DestinationPath $dest -CompressionLevel Optimal
Write-Host ''ZIP created successfully''
")

Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Compress-Archive -Path ''school-management-calendar'' -DestinationPath ''school-management-calendar-v1.0.0.zip'' -CompressionLevel Optimal -Force
Compress-Archive -Path ''school-management-student-portal'' -DestinationPath ''school-management-student-portal-v1.1.0.zip'' -CompressionLevel Optimal -Force
Write-Host ''All ZIPs created''
")

Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Compress-Archive -Path ''school-management'' -DestinationPath ''school-management.zip'' -CompressionLevel Optimal -Force
Compress-Archive -Path ''school-management-calendar'' -DestinationPath ''school-management-calendar.zip'' -CompressionLevel Optimal -Force
Compress-Archive -Path ''school-management-student-portal'' -DestinationPath ''school-management-student-portal.zip'' -CompressionLevel Optimal -Force
Write-Host ''Simple ZIP names created''
")
